    • Method Detail

      • enable

        boolean enable()
        Config property to enable HTTP/2 support.
        Returns:
        Value of property.

      • maxContentLength

        int maxContentLength()
        Default HTTP/2 content length. Streaming is currently not supported for HTTP/2, so this is largest payload acceptable.
        Returns:
        Max HTTP/2 buffer size.
